Text.Page:
I've suspected the Tenebrara for some time. I've been sending a scout to keep an eye out just in case I was right.

Go meet up with Pastin and find out what's going on.

Hmm? Oh, Tarnan sent you to collect the report?

Well, let's see. I've been watching these Tenebrara priests for a few days now. They've been casting spell after spell. Some of them look exhausted.

I'm not sure what their motivation is, but I'm pretty sure their spells are what's affecting all the nearby animals. We can't just let them keep on.

That can't have been easy. Thank you, .

Now that we've managed to put a hold on these spells, we should find out what's caused the Tenebrara's sudden change in behavior.

Search the documents in their base. See if you can find any clues.
(There is a scroll in this file cabinet.)<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>Read the scroll.</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

(The scroll reads:

Thulsa has not abandoned you, but you have let yourselves become weak.

You must regroup and collect your strength before you can continue.

-Killian)

Killian? He must have gotten the Tenebrara leaders on his side. That explains so much.

Unfortunately, that means this is worse than I thought.

Can you catch Tarnan up on what's going on?

Killian?

Oh, this is terrible. I must speak to Melrasa right away.

Thank you. Without your help, we wouldn't have this...horrifying news.
